fsrtool.name: fsrtool_fitting
fsrtool.structure: CREATE TABLE `fsrtool_fitting` ( `Id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `corpID` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `poster` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `ship` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `time` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`Id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
